T03D3813:2b-1: bha ga ba ti pradzny'a p'a ra mi ta na ba shloo ka pandi aartha t'i ka /
T03D3813:2b-3: bcom ldan 'das ma shes rab kyi pha rol tu
T03D3813:2b-4: phyin pa'i don bsdus pa'i tshigs su bcad pa dgu
T03D3813:2b-6: bcom ldan 'das ngag gi dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal lo //
T03D3813:2b-7: shes rab pha rol phyin pa rgya mtsho ste //
T03D3813:2b-8: dge ba rin chen 'byung gnas rang nyid yin //
T03D3813:2b-9: pha rol phyin pa dag ni thams cad kyang //
T03D3813:2b-10: de ru de yi bdag nyid dag gis gnas //
T03D3813:2b-11: spros pa med cing snang ba med //
T03D3813:2b-12: rtog pa med cing skyon dang bral //
T03D3813:2b-13: dngos po med cing shin tu phra //
T03D3813:2b-14: blo dang sgra ni rnam spangs pa'o //
T03D3813:2b-15: shes rab pha rol phyin yum ni //
T03D3813:2b-16: sangs rgyas thams cad bskyed pa'i mchog / rjes su mi dmigs gsum gyi tshul //
T03D3813:2b-17: kun mkhyen ye shes rgyu can gyi //
T03D3813:2b-18: shes rab pha rol phyin pa ni //
T03D3813:2b-19: gang zhig yang dag bsgom 'dod pas //
T03D3813:2b-20: des ni tshigs bcad dgu yi don //
T03D3813:2b-21: mdor bsdus pa ni bsam par bya /
T03D3813:2b-23: shes rab ni gang thos pa dang /
T03D3813:2b-25: bsgom pa'i mtshan nyid can no //
T03D3813:2b-26: pha rol tu phyin pa ni rab tu mthar thug
T03D3813:2b-27: par 'gro bas rtog pa thams cad dang bral pa'o
T03D3813:2b-28: zhes bya ba'i bar du ste /
T03D3813:2b-29: de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya ba la /
T03D3813:2b-30: de gang zhig yang dag bsgom 'dod pas zhes bya
T03D3813:2b-31: ba ni phyin ci ma log pa'i rnam pas yid
T03D3813:3a-1: mngon par dga' ba gang yin pa des ni tshigs
T03D3813:3a-2: su bcad pa dgu po 'og nas bshad pa'i don
T03D3813:3a-3: zhes pa don gyi sgo nas bsam par bya zhing
T03D3813:3a-4: yid la bya'o // ci rgyas par ram zhe na /
T03D3813:3a-5: de ma yin par bstan pa'i phyir mdor bsdus pa ni zhes bya ba smos te /
T03D3813:3a-7: tshigs su bcad pa dgu po de nyid rim gyis bstan par bya ba'i phyir /
T03D3813:3a-8: las kyi mthu las kun byung ba'i //
T03D3813:3a-9: skye mched drug gi mtshan nyid can //
T03D3813:3a-10: yang srid ces byar grags pa ni //
T03D3813:3a-11: de ni mig yor dag dang mtshungs //
T03D3813:3a-13: las ni dge ba dang mi dge ba rnams so //
T03D3813:3a-14: las de las byung ba ni las kyi mthu las zhes bya ste /
T03D3813:3a-16: de las byung ba ni yang dag par skyes pa ste /
T03D3813:3a-18: skye mched drug gi mtshan nyid can //
T03D3813:3a-20: skye ba ni rnam par shes pa'o //
T03D3813:3a-21: de rgyas par byed pas na skye mched de /
T03D3813:3a-22: nang gi bdag nyid can mig dang rna ba dang /
T03D3813:3a-23: sna dang lce dang lus dang yid dang drug ni
T03D3813:3a-24: skye mched drug gi mtshan nyid can ni mtshan ma
T03D3813:3a-25: ste / las kyi mthu las byung ba'i skye mched drug gi mtshan nyid can no //
T03D3813:3a-26: de ji lta bu zhe na /
T03D3813:3a-28: yang skye bar byed pa'i chos can zhes bya ba'i bar du'o //
T03D3813:3a-29: de ltar grags pa ni rab tu brjod cing des pa zhes bya ba'i bar du'o //
T03D3813:3a-30: yang de nyid kyi don dam pa'i ngo bo nyid gang yin pa bstan par bya ba'i phyir /
T03D3813:3a-31: de ni mig yor dag dang mtshungs //
T03D3813:3a-33: mig yor nyid 'dra zhing mtshungs pa gang yin pa de ni mig yor dang mtshungs pa ste /
T03D3813:3a-34: byed pa po las dang bya ba rnams dang bral ba'i phyir stong pa'o zhes bya ba'i bar du'o //
T03D3813:3a-35: phyi rol gyi gzugs la sogs pa'i skye mched gang
T03D3813:3a-36: yin pa'i ngo bo nyid de rim bzhin du bstan
T03D3813:3a-38: ji ltar sprul pa'i grong khyer la //
T03D3813:3a-39: sprul pa rnam par lta ba bzhin //
T03D3813:3a-40: las rnams kyis sprul 'gro ba yis //
T03D3813:3a-41: gzugs rnams de bzhin mthong bar 'gyur //
T03D3813:3a-43: ji ltar sprul pa'i grong khyer de la /
T03D3813:3a-44: de las gzhan pa'i sprul pa rnam par lta bar byed pa na /
T03D3813:3b-0: @3b de gnyis yang yod pa ma yin te /
T03D3813:3b-1: yang dag pa ma yin pa las kun du 'byung ba'i phyir /
T03D3813:3b-2: blta bar bya ba dang lta ba po gnyi ga yang de dang 'dra ste /
T03D3813:3b-3: gzugs rnams de bzhin du phyi rol du snang bar
T03D3813:3b-4: gyur pa na las kyis sprul par 'gro bas khams
T03D3813:3b-5: gsum por mthong bar 'gyur ro zhes bya bar shes
T03D3813:3b-6: par bya ste / sprul pa nyid yin par khyad par med de zhes bya bar dgongs so //
T03D3813:3b-7: sgra rnams ni brag ca dang mtshungs so zhes bstan par bya ba'i phyir /
T03D3813:3b-8: chos rnams ston pa'i sgra dang ni //
T03D3813:3b-9: thos pa'i spyod yul gang ci'ang rung //
T03D3813:3b-10: mnyan bya thos pa byung gyur pa //
T03D3813:3b-11: thams cad brag ca lta bu yin //
T03D3813:3b-13: chos rnams ston pa zhes bya ba ni ston pa
T03D3813:3b-14: po'i dbang du byas pa las byung zhing de las
T03D3813:3b-16: thos pa'i spyod yul ni thos pa'i yul du gyur pa rnams so //
T03D3813:3b-17: gang ci'ang rung zhes bya ba ni /
T03D3813:3b-18: gang de dang rigs mthun pa rnams kyang ngo //
T03D3813:3b-19: mnyan bya thos pa byung gyur pa //
T03D3813:3b-21: mnyan par bya ba thos shing nye bar dmigs pa gang ci yang rung ba'i sgra rnams te /
T03D3813:3b-22: gang las thos par gyur pa yod pa rnams so //
T03D3813:3b-23: de bas na khyad par med par bstan par bya ba'i phyir /
T03D3813:3b-24: thams cad ces bya ba smos so ;
T03D3813:3b-25: / brag ca lta bu yin zhes bya ba ni
T03D3813:3b-26: gang 'di thams cad kyang brag ca dang mtshungs par
T03D3813:3b-28: skyes bu'i rmi lam dang 'dra bar bstan pa'i phyir /
T03D3813:3b-29: yul la chags pas snom pa dang //
T03D3813:3b-30: myang dang de bzhin reg pa rnams //
T03D3813:3b-31: dmigs su yod pa ma yin te //
T03D3813:3b-34: yul la chags pas zhes bya ba ni gang yul
T03D3813:3b-35: 'dod pa de rnams kyis zhes re re la'ang sbyar
T03D3813:3b-36: bar bya'o // snom pa dang zhes bya ba ni
T03D3813:3b-37: sna'i rnam par shes pas yul du byas pa ste
T03D3813:3b-38: bar bya'o // / dri'i rdzas rnams so//
T03D3813:3b-39: myang zhes bya ba ni ro zhes bya ba rnams so //
T03D3813:3b-40: de bzhin reg pa rnams zhes bya ba ni reg bya rnams te /
T03D3813:3b-41: de ltar yul la chags pa rnams kyis gang zhig
T03D3813:3b-42: spyod pa'i dri dang ro dang reg bya zhes bya
T03D3813:3b-43: bar grags pa de rnams ni dmigs su yod pa
T03D3813:3b-44: ma yin te / ci'i phyir zhe na /
T03D3813:4a-3: de rnams ni rmi lam dang mtshungs shing khyad par med do zhes bya bar dgongs so //
T03D3813:4a-5: mig la sogs pa nang gi skye mched rnams dang
T03D3813:4a-6: gzugs la sogs pa phyi'i skye mched rnams kyang med
T03D3813:4a-7: par gyur na de dang ldan pa'i bya ba dang
T03D3813:4a-8: spyod pa ji ltar snang zhes rtog pa bsal ba'i
T03D3813:4a-9: phyir / ji ltar sgyu ma'i 'khrul 'khor mi //
T03D3813:4a-10: bya ba tha dad byed pa ltar //
T03D3813:4a-12: de bzhin bya ba byed par 'gyur //
T03D3813:4a-14: sgyu ma nyid kyi 'khrul 'khor gyi gzugs brnyan gyi
T03D3813:4a-15: mi gang yin pa de ni sgyu ma'i 'khrul 'khor
T03D3813:4a-16: gyi mi'o // bya ba tha dad byed pa ltar //
T03D3813:4a-17: zhes bya ba ni ji ltar de la bya ba
T03D3813:4a-18: dang spyod pa yod pa ma yin yang de la
T03D3813:4a-19: lus kyi spyod pa dang bya ba 'gro ba la
T03D3813:4a-20: sogs pa'i mtshan nyid can tha dad cing sna tshogs
T03D3813:4a-25: lus nyid 'khrul 'khor lta bu yin pas na lus kyi 'khrul 'khor zhes bya'o //
T03D3813:4a-26: gang gi phyir bdag dang bral bas na bdag med pa zhes bya ste /
T03D3813:4a-27: de ltar bdag med pas na 'di la ni don
T03D3813:4a-28: dam par bya ba dang ldan pa 'ga' yang med
T03D3813:4a-29: do zhes bya ba'i bar du'o //
T03D3813:4a-30: de bzhin bya ba byed par 'gyur //
T03D3813:4a-31: zhes bya ba ni de ltar bya ba dang ldan
T03D3813:4a-32: pa'i bdag med kyang sgyu ma'i 'khrul 'khor gyi mi'i
T03D3813:4a-33: gzugs brnyan bya ba sna tshogs byed pa de bzhin
T03D3813:4a-34: du 'dir yang de dang khyad par shes par bya'o//
T03D3813:4a-35: smig rgyu dang mtshungs bar yang bstan par bya ba'i phyir /
T03D3813:4a-36: dmigs pa sna tshogs gang dang gang //
T03D3813:4a-38: mthong na 'jig cing mtshan nyid bral //
T03D3813:4a-39: 'di ni smig rgyu dag dang mtshungs //
T03D3813:4a-41: dmigs pa rnam pa sna tshogs gang yin pa de
T03D3813:4a-42: ni nye bar dbye bas yongs su brtags pa yin
T03D3813:4a-43: la / gang dang gang zhes bya ba ni skad cig ma'i mtshan nyid can no //
T03D3813:4a-45: zhes bya ba ni skad cig re re zhing skye bar 'gyur ba'am /
T03D3813:4a-46: mtshan nyid so sor 'byung bar 'gyur bas na /
T03D3813:4b-2: skad cig ma nyid do zhes bya ba'i bar du'o //
T03D3813:4b-3: de yang don dam par ngo bo nyid ji lta bu zhe na /
T03D3813:4b-4: mthong na 'jig cing mtshan nyid bral //
T03D3813:4b-5: 'di ni smig rgyu dag dang mtshungs //
T03D3813:4b-8: nyi ma'i 'od zer phrad pa las smig rgyu'i tshogs
T03D3813:4b-9: snang ba dang po mthong ba yang phyis 'jig par
T03D3813:4b-10: 'gyur ba de bzhin du nye bar dmigs pa'i yul
T03D3813:4b-11: rnams la rnam par shes pa 'byung ba ni dngos
T03D3813:4b-12: po med cing mtshan nyid dang bral bas sngon dang
T03D3813:4b-13: phyi ma mi 'phrad pa'i ngo bo nyid yin pa'i
T03D3813:4b-14: phyir / mi 'dra ba'i rang bzhin can yin pa
T03D3813:4b-15: las byis par gyur pas mtha' gcig tu rtog cing
T03D3813:4b-16: phyir / 'dug la / kun rdzob kyi bden par
T03D3813:4b-17: rtogs pa'i gzung ba dang 'dzin pa'i cha gnyis su
T03D3813:4b-18: snang ba de yang gang stong zhing rang bzhin gyis
T03D3813:4b-19: 'od gsal ba gzod ma nyid nas ma skyes pa'i
T03D3813:4b-20: sems kyi chos nyid du bstan pa yin no //
T03D3813:4b-21: gzugs brnyan dang 'dra ba nyid du bstan par bya ba'i phyir /
T03D3813:4b-22: gzung bya gzugs brnyan lta bu ste //
T03D3813:4b-23: thog ma med pa'i sems las byung //
T03D3813:4b-24: rnam par shes pa'ang de 'dra ste //
T03D3813:4b-25: phan tshun gzugs brnyan dag dang mtshungs //
T03D3813:4b-27: gzung bya zhes bya ba ni kha phyir bltas pa
T03D3813:4b-28: goms pa'i bag chags kyi dbang du byas pa ste
T03D3813:4b-29: / gzung ba nyid du mngon par zhen pas /
T03D3813:4b-30: gnyis su med na yang ngo bo nyid gnyis su so sor snang bar gyur pa'o //
T03D3813:4b-31: gzugs brnyan lta bu ste zhes bya ba ni gzugs
T03D3813:4b-32: brnyan dang mtshungs pa gang yin pa de la ni
T03D3813:4b-33: gzugs brnyan lta bu zhes bya ba ste /
T03D3813:4b-34: me long gi dkyil 'khor gyi nang du chud pa'i bzhin la sogs pa dang 'dra ba'o //
T03D3813:4b-35: thog ma zhes bya ba ni thog ma med pa'i
T03D3813:4b-36: dus kyi sems kyi rnam par 'phrul pa las byung
T03D3813:4b-38: sems las byung zhes bya ba ste /
T03D3813:4b-39: sems nyid las byung bas na sems las byung ba zhes bya ba yin te /
T03D3813:4b-40: de tsam du rjes su 'brel ba'i phyi'i dngos po
T03D3813:4b-41: la ltos pa med la zhes bya ba'i bar du'o
T03D3813:4b-42: // de bas na de ni gzugs brnyan lta bu ste /
T03D3813:4b-43: spyi dang khyad par gyi dus nyid kyis rnam par brtag sna yod pa ma yin no //
T03D3813:5a-0: 'ba' zhig tu ma zad kyi rnam @5a * //
T03D3813:5a-1: par shes pa'ang de dang 'dra ste zhes bya ba ni /
T03D3813:5a-2: rnam pa de nyid dang cha 'dra ba'i shes pa
T03D3813:5a-3: gang yin pa de la rnam par shes pa'ang de
T03D3813:5a-5: 'ang zhes bya ba ni bsdu ba ste /
T03D3813:5a-6: 'dzin pa yod pa'ang de dang 'dra ste /
T03D3813:5a-7: gzung bar bya ba dang bral na 'dzin pa po
T03D3813:5a-8: 'ang yod pa ma yin no bya bar dgongs te
T03D3813:5a-9: / 'brel pa'i sgras ni phan tshun gcig la gcig ltos pa yin pa'i phyir /
T03D3813:5a-10: phan tshun gzugs brnyan dag dang mtshungs //
T03D3813:5a-12: gzung bar bya ba dang 'dzin po ni gcig la gcig ltos par bya ba yin te /
T03D3813:5a-13: de gnyis kar dmigs pa'i phan tshun rjes su 'brel
T03D3813:5a-14: pa'i ngo bo nyid ni rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal
T03D3813:5a-15: ba'i sems kyi chos nyid yin no zhes bya bar
T03D3813:5a-16: dgongs so // rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba'i sems
T03D3813:5a-17: de nyid kyang gzung ba dang 'dzin pa dang bral
T03D3813:5a-18: dgongs so // zhing / 'dod chags la sogs pa dang ma rig pa'i dri ma spangs te /
T03D3813:5a-19: rnam par dag par gyur pa ni yod do zhes
T03D3813:5a-20: mngon par zhen pa spangs par bya ba'i don du
T03D3813:5a-21: chu zla dang mtshungs par bstan par bya ba'i phyir
T03D3813:5a-22: // bsgom pa dang ba'i rgyud la ni //
T03D3813:5a-23: ye shes zla ba gang byung ba //
T03D3813:5a-24: mngon sum yod pa ma yin te //
T03D3813:5a-25: de ni chu zla dag dang mtshungs//
T03D3813:5a-27: bsgom pa ni sems rtse gcig pa'i mtshan nyid can te /
T03D3813:5a-28: de gang la yod pa de ni bsgom pa'o //
T03D3813:5a-29: dang ba ni bag chags kyi rnyog pa dang bral ba'o //
T03D3813:5a-30: rgyud la zhes bya ba ni lus dang ngag dang yid kyi rgyud de /
T03D3813:5a-31: rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba lugs las bzlog cing /
T03D3813:5a-32: yang dag pa'i ye shes skyes pa'i bdag nyid can la'o //
T03D3813:5a-33: ye shes zla ba gang byung ba //
T03D3813:5a-34: zhes bya ba ni yang dag pa'i ye shes ni
T03D3813:5a-35: ma rig pa'i mun pa sel cing nyon mongs pa'i
T03D3813:5a-37: bag chags kyi dri mas ma gos pas zla ba dang chos mthun pa'i phyir /
T03D3813:5a-38: ye shes zla bzhes bya la /
T03D3813:5a-39: de rgyud dag pa gang las byung zhing shar ba de yang dngos por gzung du med pa'i phyir /
T03D3813:5a-40: mngon sum yod pa ma yin te //
T03D3813:5a-42: de ltar snang du zin kyang gang gi phyir mngon sum du dmigs shing gzung du med do //
T03D3813:5b-0: stong pa nyid kyi chos rnams @5b las stong pa
T03D3813:5b-1: nyid kyi chos rnams kho na 'byung ba'i phyir ro
T03D3813:5b-2: // de bas na gzod ma nyid nas ma skyes pa'i phyir /
T03D3813:5b-3: de ni chu zla dag dang mtshungs //
T03D3813:5b-5: 'di ltar chos kyi dbyings kyi ngo bo nyid yin
T03D3813:5b-6: pas na dngos po la mngon par zhen pa mngon
T03D3813:5b-7: sum du dmigs su yod pa ma yin no ;
T03D3813:5b-8: / de ltar de kho na nyid yin pa'i phyir
T03D3813:5b-9: chos thams cad dmigs su med pas mngon sum du
T03D3813:5b-10: bya bar mi nus she na /
T03D3813:5b-11: mngon sum du bya ba'i thabs chos thams cad nam mkha' dang mnyam par bstan par bya ba'i phyir /
T03D3813:5b-12: rnal 'byor ba yi ye shes gang //
T03D3813:5b-13: de yang nam mkha'i mtshan nyid de //
T03D3813:5b-14: de bas shes dang shes bya dag / thams cad nam mkha'i mtshan nyid do //
T03D3813:5b-17: sems rtse gcig pa'i mtshan nyid dang /
T03D3813:5b-19: yang dag pa'i shes rab kyi mtshan nyid zung du
T03D3813:5b-20: 'brel bar 'jug pa la ni rnal 'byor ces bya
T03D3813:5b-21: la de gang la yod pa de la ni rnal
T03D3813:5b-23: de rnams kyi ye shes gang yin pa de dag
T03D3813:5b-24: kyang chos thams cad nam mkha'i mtshan nyid yin pa'i
T03D3813:5b-25: phyir / 'khor ba dang mya ngan las 'das pa
T03D3813:5b-26: la mi gnas pa'i ngo bo nyid thabs dang shes
T03D3813:5b-27: rab gnyis su med par gyur pa'i de bzhin nyid
T03D3813:5b-28: kyi ye shes de ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i bdag
T03D3813:5b-29: phyir / nyid can te / de yang phung po
T03D3813:5b-30: dang khams dang skye mched la sogs pa spros pa'i
T03D3813:5b-31: bdag nyid can ma yin te /
T03D3813:5b-32: gang de bzhin nyid kyi bdag nyid can chos kyi
T03D3813:5b-33: dbyings mi g-yo ba'i ngo bo nyid kyis gzod ma
T03D3813:5b-34: nyid nas ma skyes pa'i rang bzhin te /
T03D3813:5b-35: 'gro ba dang 'od ba la sogs pa'i ngo bo
T03D3813:5b-36: nyid dang bral ba'i phyir dngos po med pa'o zhes
T03D3813:5b-37: kyang brjod par nus pa ma yin te /
T03D3813:5b-38: dgag par byed pa med pa'i phyir ro //
T03D3813:5b-39: ma skyes pa'i ngo bo nyid du yang yod pa ma yin te /
T03D3813:5b-41: de yang nam mkha'i mtshan nyid de //
T03D3813:5b-43: spros pa thams cad dang bral ba'i phyir ;
T03D3813:5b-44: nam mkha' dang 'dra bas na nam mkha' ste /
T03D3813:5b-45: de nyid kyi mtshan nyid can gyi mtshan ma gang yin pa de nam mkha'i mtshan nyid de /
T03D3813:5b-46: gang gi phyir rgyu des na chos thams cad sgrib
T03D3813:5b-47: pa med pa'i ngo bo nyid yin pa'i phyir ro
T03D3813:5b-48: // gtan tshigs de bas na shes pa ste /
T03D3813:6a-2: sems las byung ba rnams kyang nam mkha'i mtshan nyid yin la /
T03D3813:6a-4: des mthong ba'i yul ma rig pa'i rjes su zhugs
T03D3813:6a-5: pas snod dang bcud kyi 'jig rten gyi mtshan nyid
T03D3813:6a-6: can sems can rnams kyi phung po khams dang skye
T03D3813:6a-7: mched la sogs pa'i ngo bo nyid ni shes bya
T03D3813:6a-8: ste / shes pas yul du byas pas shes bya
T03D3813:6a-9: nyid tsam du rjes su 'brel cing khong du chud
T03D3813:6a-10: par bya ba'i shes bya gang yin pa de ni
T03D3813:6a-11: yul nyid du yongs su brtags pas shes bya zhes
T03D3813:6a-12: ste / bya la / thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes la ni /
T03D3813:6a-13: de gnyi ga yang nam mkha' dang mnyam mo //
T03D3813:6a-14: de bas na de'i khyab pa nyid bstan pa ni thams cad ces bya ba ste /
T03D3813:6a-15: phyogs gcig tsam ma yin te lhag ma med par ro //
T03D3813:6a-16: gang 'di ltar nyan thos rnams kyis gang zag tsam
T03D3813:6a-17: la bdag med kyi phung po la sogs pa yod
T03D3813:6a-18: pa dang / de rnams kyi thar pa'i mtshan nyid
T03D3813:6a-19: du phung po lhag ma dang bcas pa'i mya ngan
T03D3813:6a-21: gzhan du na lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan las 'das par 'dod cing smra la /
T03D3813:6a-22: bcom ldan 'das kyis ni de dag thams cad nas
T03D3813:6a-23: thams cad du dngos po thams cad stong pa nyid
T03D3813:6a-24: du gsungs kyi / mu stegs pa lta bu'i phyogs gcig pa'i stong pa nyid ni ma yin no //
T03D3813:6a-25: de bas na de'i don ni 'di yin te /
T03D3813:6a-26: 'gro ba gang ci 'ang rung nam mkha'i mtshan nyid du ma gyur pa ni 'ga' yang med de /
T03D3813:6a-28: thams cad nam mkha'i mtshan nyid do //
T03D3813:6a-30: de ltar tshigs su bcad pa dgus de kho na nyid bstan nas /
T03D3813:6a-31: 'dir dngos po med pas thob pa'i 'bras bu med
T03D3813:6a-32: par dogs pa bsal cing byang chub sems dpa'i rigs
T03D3813:6a-33: can rnams kyi 'bras bu nye bar bstan pa'i phyir
T03D3813:6a-34: / de ltar de bzhin nyid sems pa //
T03D3813:6a-35: dngos po kun la mi gnas te //
T03D3813:6a-36: byang chub smon pa'i sems kyis ni //
T03D3813:6a-38: zhes bya ba smos pa yin no //
T03D3813:6a-39: bcom ldan 'das ma shes rab kyi pha rol tu
T03D3813:6a-40: phyin pa'i don bsdus pa tshigs su bcad pa dgu
T03D3813:6a-41: pa'i rgya cher bshad pa slob dpon chen po kam
T03D3813:6a-42: pa la'i zhal snga nas mdzad pa rdzogs so /
T03D3813:6b-0: // / @6b rgya gar gyi mkhan po ka ma la gupta dang /
